reviewText: I have 4 children 16, 12, 8 and 4...while the 16 and 12 year olds didn't care to see these movies from being too old, they had seen them previously in school when they were younger and loved them then.  My 8 year old just finished reading the books with his class and really wanted to see the movies so we ordered them.  Both the 8 and 4 year old have watched all of these movies 4 or 5 times now since we got them.  The price was perfect, shipping was fast, and the entertainment value was great!  Love this set!
Title: N/A

reviewText: My son had rememebered seeing this on TV sometime in the distant past.  We were able to find it on DVD at Netflix.  He wanted it for Christmas, and Amazon came through for us.  He was very happy and we all enjoyed the movie.
summary: Great story on video for everyone
